brand_enable.name: Show Product Brand
brand_enable.help: If enabled, the product 'Brand' will display on top of the product name.

sku_enable.name: Show Product SKU
sku_enable.help: If enabled, the product 'SKU' will be displayed below the product name.

stock_enable.name: Show Product Stock
stock_enable.help: If enabled, the product 'Stock' will be displayed below the product name (and after the SKU if enabled).
